sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些代词均表示"没人"之意。
means: nobody ： 普通用词，表单数，只能指代人，不能用于加of表范围的结构中。
none ： 可指代人或物，表示对三者以上的否定，可跟表范围的of结构。
no one ： 只用于指人，在英国英语中写成no-none，通常后面不连用of。

sentence.Network_en: "Wait a damn minute," Mindy spat. "Nobody said anything about staying overnight."
sentence.Network_cn: “该死的，等一下”，明迪愤愤地说道，“谁也没说过要过夜。”

sentence.Network_en: Nobody else believed that they had tried to rub out the pope.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他人都不相信他们试图杀死教皇。

sentence.Network_en: They were shut away in a little room where nobody could overhear.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被关在一个小屋里，没人能听到他们的动静。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: originally as no body

encyclopedia.content: 歌曲及专辑介绍歌曲介绍 1969年Jackson5的第一张专辑《DIANA ROSS PRESENTS THE JACKSON FIVE》（戴安娜罗斯献上Jackson五兄弟）里第二首。 从这首歌里可以听到才11岁的MJ超有爆发力的小声音，非常的娴熟，收放自如足足像一个已经唱了50年的老牌唱将。 专辑介绍 专辑《DIANA ROSS PRESENTS THE JACKSON FIVE》是The Jackson 5的第一张专辑，也是后来流行音乐之王迈克尔杰克逊的最早的一部作品。 专辑名称：Diana Ross Presents th

entry.def: Nobody means not a single person, or not a single member of a particular group or set.

example.ex: They were shut away in a little room where nobody could overhear...
example.tran: 他们被关在一个小屋里，没人能听到他们的动静。

example.ex: Nobody realizes how bad things are...
example.tran: 没人意识到事情是多么糟糕。

entry.def: If someone says that a person is a nobody, they are saying in an unkind way that the person is not at all important.

example.ex: A man in my position has nothing to fear from a nobody like you.
example.tran: 处在我这样位置的人，一点都不害怕像你这种小人物。

Sentence.sentence: The Magician   The revolution that Steve Jobs led is only just beginning When it came to putting on a show, nobody else in the computer industry, or any other industry for that matter, could match Steve Jobs
We learn from the first paragraph that nobody could match Steve Jobs in
They may have nobody to depend on in the future.
Nobody ever had a better time or did more exotic strange things than I did in an 80-year period.

Ronald Lee, director of the Centre on the Economics and Demography of Ageing at the University of California, Berkeley, puts it briefly and clearly: "We don't really know what population ageing will be like, because nobody has done it yet
nobody is willing to sacrifice their own interests to tackle the problem

means.word_mean: 没有人, 无人, 谁也不

sentences.en: It was so cold that nobody can make his hands naked.
sentences.cn: 天气太冷, 没有人能把手露在外面。

means.word_mean: 小人物, 无足轻重的人

sentences.en: He is a mere nobody, and it is mere a matter of time for people to recognize him.
sentences.cn: 他只不过是个小人物, 要大家认清这一点只是时间问题。

jushi.english: He was such a fast talker that nobody could understand him.
jushi.chinese: 他讲话很快,没有人能听懂。

jushi.english: It was so cold that nobody can make his hands naked.
jushi.chinese: 天气太冷,没有人能把手露在外面。

jushi.english: Is it true that nobody loves a fat woman?
jushi.chinese: 没有人喜欢胖女人,是真的吗?
